title: UI Improvements
message:
UI Improvements

Changed the new and history buttons to have an ellipse with the light tan background on selected instead of a white background.
Added 4 images on the main screen.
Changed main screen to be full screen.
Added an info button instead of a context menu About button due to being a full screen app.

title: Fixed playing music
message:
Fixed playing music

The async task that was playing the music was getting hung up and the thread was never terminating and not allowing us to replay the sound. Fixed up exiting the thread when the playback is completed so you can play the sound again.

title: Added context menu to GameActivity
message:
Added context menu to GameActivity

Added a Rename and a Delete option to the games.
Rename simply renames the game and updates the name in the database.
Delete deletes the game from the Games table and all players associated with that game from the Players table.
Removed commented out code.

title: Updated game date
message:
Updated game date

Added the time to the game date.
Set the title of the GameActivity to the current game date.

title: Handle config orientations
message:
Handle config orientations

Force the app to be in Portrait mode.

title: Name updating improvement
message:
Name updating improvement

Only update the players name if it changes. Instead of always updating it when the focus is lost, it only gets updated when the name changes.

title: Fixed slow response for changing name
message:
Fixed slow response for changing name

The database was being updated with the name after every keypress. This was causing multiple events to be fired and thus slowed down the screen refreshing. Changed it to be updated after the text box loses focus.

title: Massive update
message:
Massive update

Added Copyright to all files
Updated layouts
Update values for players as they are edited
Added in empty list string for players summary page
Players summary only displays the players with a total value above 0
Fragments are not deleted and are recycled
Fragments are loaded as needed and kept in memory
Players summary sorts the players by the highest value first

title: Added computations and updating totals on the player pages
message:
Added computations and updating totals on the player pages

Converted titles and subtitles to string arrays
Compute player total after typing in the quantities
Update the total amount after each value is updated
Removed unused code
